days.title: Conflict Resolution - Solving Problems Peacefully
days.learning_objective: Practice mediation and negotiation skills essential for personal relationships, community organizing, and international diplomacy.

days.title: Conflict Resolution - Solving Human Disputes
days.learning_objective: Master alternative dispute resolution while understanding how peaceful conflict resolution protects human rights and strengthens democratic institutions.

days.title: Immune System - Your Body's Defense Force
days.learning_objective: Understand biological defense systems while exploring how immunology informs public health policy and medical innovation.

days.title: Digestive System - How Your Body Processes Food
days.learning_objective: Explore human biology while understanding how nutrition science informs health policy, food security, and sustainable agriculture.

days.title: Landscape Design - Shaping Outdoor Spaces
days.learning_objective: Practice ecological design while understanding how landscape architecture affects environmental health, social equity, and community wellbeing.

days.title: Chemical Reactions - How Substances Transform
days.learning_objective: Understand molecular processes while exploring how chemistry enables materials science, medicine, and sustainable technology.

days.title: Business Innovation - Creating Value in Commerce
days.learning_objective: Practice entrepreneurial thinking while understanding how business models affect economic equity, environmental sustainability, and social impact.

days.title: Resilience Building - Bouncing Back from Setbacks
days.learning_objective: Develop coping strategies while understanding how community resilience enables adaptation to climate change, economic disruption, and social challenges.

days.title: Leadership Studies - How to Guide and Inspire
days.learning_objective: Practice leadership skills while understanding how democratic leadership differs from authoritarian control and enables collective action.

days.title: Circulatory System - Your Body's Transportation Network
days.learning_objective: Model biological networks while understanding how circulation principles apply to transportation systems, communication networks, and economic flow.

days.title: Respiratory System - How You Breathe Life
days.learning_objective: Understand gas exchange while exploring how respiratory science informs air quality policy, occupational health, and medical technology.

days.title: Music Composition - Creating Melodies and Harmonies
days.learning_objective: Practice creative expression while understanding how musical structure reflects mathematical relationships and enables cultural communication.

days.title: Nuclear Energy - The Power of the Atom
days.learning_objective: Understand nuclear physics while exploring energy policy, radiation safety, and the balance between technological benefits and risks.

days.title: Social Innovation - Solving Society's Problems
days.learning_objective: Practice social entrepreneurship while understanding how innovation can address inequality, environmental challenges, and democratic participation.

days.title: Nervous System - Your Body's Communication Network
days.learning_objective: Understand neural networks while exploring how neuroscience informs education, technology design, and mental health treatment.

days.title: Social Psychology - How Groups Influence Individuals
days.learning_objective: Understand group dynamics while building skills for resisting manipulation, promoting inclusion, and strengthening democratic deliberation.

days.title: Muscular System - Your Body's Movement Machinery
days.learning_objective: Explore biomechanics while understanding how movement science informs ergonomics, sports performance, and rehabilitation technology.

days.title: Endocrine System - Your Body's Chemical Messengers
days.learning_objective: Understand hormonal regulation while exploring how endocrinology informs environmental health, reproduction rights, and medical ethics.

days.title: Songwriting - Putting Words to Music
days.learning_objective: Practice creative expression while understanding how music enables cultural preservation, social commentary, and cross-cultural communication.

days.title: Quantum Mechanics - The Strange World of the Very Small
days.learning_objective: Explore quantum physics while understanding how quantum technology enables secure communication, powerful computing, and scientific advancement.

days.title: Medical Innovation - Advancing Health and Healing
days.learning_objective: Understand biomedical research while exploring healthcare equity, research ethics, and the regulation of medical technology.

days.title: Reproductive Biology - How Life Continues
days.learning_objective: Understand biological reproduction while exploring reproductive rights, genetic counseling, and bioethics in reproductive technology.

days.title: Communication Skills - Expressing Yourself Clearly
days.learning_objective: Practice effective communication while understanding how communication skills enable democratic participation, conflict resolution, and leadership.

days.title: Microbiology - The World of Tiny Life
days.learning_objective: Explore microscopic life while understanding how microbiology informs medicine, agriculture, and biotechnology applications.

days.title: Marine Biology - Life in the Oceans
days.learning_objective: Understand ocean ecosystems while exploring how marine science informs climate policy, fisheries management, and conservation biology.

days.title: Musical Instruments - Tools for Making Sound
days.learning_objective: Explore acoustic principles while understanding how musical technology enables cultural expression and therapeutic applications.

days.title: Thermodynamics - The Science of Energy and Heat
days.learning_objective: Understand energy principles while exploring how thermodynamics enables engine technology, renewable energy, and climate science.

days.title: Educational Innovation - New Ways to Learn
days.learning_objective: Explore pedagogical innovation while understanding how educational technology can promote equity, accessibility, and lifelong learning.

days.title: Botany - The Science of Plants
days.learning_objective: Understand plant biology while exploring how botanical knowledge informs agriculture, medicine, and environmental restoration.

days.title: Leadership Skills - Inspiring and Guiding Others
days.learning_objective: Practice democratic leadership while understanding how servant leadership differs from domination and enables collective empowerment.
